videos.headline: Vantrease trucks a defender, eventually scores
videos.description: Kyle Vantrease keeps the ball and bulldozes a defender for what is initially ruled a touchdown. The call is overturned, but Vantrease scores on the quarterback sneak two plays later.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Vantrease trucks a defender, eventually scores) 2019/12/20

videos.headline: Charlotte QB gets leveled by Buffalo defender
videos.description: Charlotte QB Chris Reynolds rolls out of the pocket but doesn't recognize the pressure from Malcolm Koonce who gets the sack, forcing the fumble.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Charlotte QB gets leveled by Buffalo defender) 2019/12/20

videos.headline: Patterson spins past defenders for the Buffalo TD
videos.description: Jaret Patterson spins around defenders and gets into the end zone for the 6-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Patterson spins past defenders for the Buffalo TD) 2019/12/20

videos.headline: Tucker weaves through defenders for 51-yard TD
videos.description: Chris Reynolds finds Victor Tucker over the middle who stays on his feet and goes for the 51-yard touchdown to put Charlotte on the board.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Tucker weaves through defenders for 51-yard TD) 2019/12/10
